text: *** Bug 32716 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
Bug 22415 can be a catch-all "apr-iconv is broken in various ways on Unix and
nobody cares" bug.  You don't need apr-iconv on Linux, so don't build it. 
Reporting bugs about this won't really help, submitting patches might :)

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 22415 ***

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Changed resolution to INVALID since duplicate bug has been deleted from Bugzilla and leaving as DUPLICATE creates referential integrity issues for the underlying database.
